content.en: Engine optimization: Researchers have been using algorithms to optimize the performance and emissions of biodiesel engines. These algorithms, such as the Non-dominated sorting genetic algorithm-II and the Hybrid response surface methodology-non-dominated sorting genetic algorithm-II, are employed to analyze variables and optimize engine parameters. Other algorithms like Artificial Neural Network (ANN) and Genetic Algorithm (GA) are used to optimize engine performance when fueled with different biodiesel blends.
content.da: Motoroptimering: Forskere har brugt algoritmer til at optimere ydeevne og emissioner af biodieselmotorer. Disse algoritmer, såsom Non-dominated sorting genetic algorithm-II og Hybrid response surface methodology-non-dominated sorting genetic algorithm-II, anvendes til at analysere variabler og optimere motorparametre. Andre algoritmer som Artificial Neural Network (ANN) og Genetic Algorithm (GA) bruges til at optimere motorens ydeevne, når de kører på forskellige biodieselblandinger.
